answers.answer: Is it possible its nt just measuring a week ahead but is a week further then you thought?
That would seem odd because baby doubled in size technically at beginning and middle, maybe he/she is growing faster than expected im sure its possible right

question: According to midwife my other babies have been big in size when i was pregnant an grew fast but still they where late and both weighed 7 pounds 8/6 so because this one is measured a week ahead at 12 week scan an now again a week ahead 20 weeks i have to drink something and blood taken which ive never heard of to do with diabetes
title: 20 week scan
